body: This was quite a good story I really hope that the author is thinking of making more to this as I really enjoyed the main story and the additional story but I'm hoping even though it's been a year there's a chance a new one could be made.
i want justice for Naoto, i wish author will make another manga with Naoto as mc
Would've been nut if the main series is uncensored too. But damn 5 years difference on art you can see that this one is hella clean + uncensored 10/10
